skills.label: Apply and manipulate Outlook program options
items: Set general, mail, calendar, tasks, notes and journal, advanced, and language options

skills.label: Manipulate item tags
items: Categorize items, set flags, set sensitivity level, mark items as read or unread, and view message properties

skills.label: Arrange the Content pane
items: Show or hide fields in a list view, change the reading view, and use the reminders window and people pane

skills.label: Apply search and filter tools
items: Use built-in search folders

skills.label: Print an Outlook item
items: Print attachments, calendars, multiple messages, multiple contact records, tasks, and multiple notes

skills.label: Create and send email messages
items: Specify a message theme
Specify plain text, rich text, or html message content format
Show or hide the from and bcc fields
Set a reminder for message recipients
Specify the sending account
Specify the sent item folder
Configure message delivery options
Configure voting and tracking options
And send a message to a contact group

skills.label: Create and manage Quick Steps
items: Perform, create, edit, delete, and duplicate quick steps, reset quick steps to default settings

skills.label: Create item content
items: Insert graphical elements, insert a hyperlink

skills.label: Format item content
items: Use formatting tools, apply styles, create styles and themes, use paste special, and format graphical elements

skills.label: Attach content to email messages
items: Attach an outlook item, attach external files

skills.label: Clean up the mailbox
items: View mailbox size, save message attachments, save a message in an external format, ignore a conversation, and use clean-up tools

skills.label: Create and manage rules
items: Create, modify, and delete rules

skills.label: Manage junk mail
items: Allow a specific message (not junk) and filter junk mail with never block sender, never block sender’s domain, never block this group or mailing list, and block sender

skills.label: Manage automatic message content
items: Manage signatures, specify the font for new html messages, plain-text messages, specify options for replies and forwards, and set a default theme for all html messages, stationery, and fonts

skills.label: Create and manipulate contacts
items: Modify a default business card, forward a contact, and update a contact in the address book

skills.label: Create and manipulate contact groups
items: Create a contact group, manage contact group membership, show notes about a contact group, forward a contact group, delete a contact group, and send a meeting to a contact group

skills.label: Create and manipulate appointments and events
items: Set appointment options, print appointment details, forward an appointment, and schedule a meeting with a message sender

skills.label: Create and manipulate meeting requests
items: Set response options, update a meeting request, cancel a meeting or invitation, and propose a new time for a meeting

skills.label: Manipulate the Calendar pane
items: Arrange the calendar view, change the calendar color, display or hide calendars, and create a calendar group

label: Work with tasks, notes, and journal entries (5–10%)

skills.label: Create and manipulate tasks
items: Create a task, manage task details, send a status report, mark a task as complete, move or copy a task to another folder, assign a task to another outlook user, accept or decline a task assignment, update an assigned task, and use current view

skills.label: Create and manipulate notes
items: Create a note, change the current view, and categorize notes

skills.label: Create and manipulate Journal entries
items: Automatically record outlook items, automatically record files, and edit a journal entry
